name: LoopingIteratorTest
description: Unit tests for the LoopingIterator class, which tests various functionalities including constructor exceptions, looping behavior, removal, reset, and size methods.

test_cases.name: testConstructorEx
test_cases.description: Tests the constructor exception when a null list is passed.

test_cases.name: testLooping0
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of an empty looping iterator.

test_cases.name: testLooping1
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of a looping iterator with a single element.

test_cases.name: testLooping2
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of a looping iterator with two elements.

test_cases.name: testLooping3
test_cases.description: Tests the behavior of a looping iterator with three elements.

test_cases.name: testRemoving1
test_cases.description: Tests the remove() method on a LoopingIterator wrapped ArrayList.

test_cases.name: testReset
test_cases.description: Tests the reset() method on a LoopingIterator wrapped ArrayList.

test_cases.name: testSize
test_cases.description: Tests the size() method on a LoopingIterator wrapped ArrayList.
